snippet: The attack occurred a day after Mayor Bill de Blasio visited the jail complex to unveil a plan aimed at preventing weapons and drugs from being smuggled into city jails.
abstract: Investigators are struggling to determine how Sunil Poonai, newly-arrived inmate at Rikers Island, was able to obtain large kitchen knife and slash another inmate, Martin Street; incident follows one day after New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio visited facility to unveil new plan aimed at curbing smuggling into city's jails.

byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and MICHAEL WINERIP

lead_paragraph: The attack occurred a day after Mayor Bill de Blasio visited the jail complex to unveil a plan aimed at preventing weapons and drugs from being smuggled into city jails.

headline.main: Inmate Is Slashed at Rikers; Officials Investigate How Knife Was Obtained
headline.print_headline: Inmate Is Slashed at Rikers; Officials Investigate How Knife Was Obtained
